question: You saw an advertisement in the paper for a property management position at an apartment complex. Write a letter to express your interest. Include•	Why you are writing•	Your suitability for the role•	How you would approach the position
text: I am writing to enlighten you that I am biased toward carrying out the role which is promoted as administration of the ASP building complex on Niavaran Alley. I attached my resume; however, I would like to elaborate more in the letter.

Since I graduated in the master of Business Management from Tehran University, I am qualified to fulfil the obligations submitted in the job description. Furthermore, I experienced a similar post in Ekbatan company- an international holding company that operates in the construction area and runs a variety of complexes around the country and abroad- within 10 years. Not only am I familiar with daily duties but I also know the regulations and legislations of residential buildings.

As I have the reputation of being assiduous and well-connected, if I would be recruited, I will changeover the infrastructures of deals and terms of contracts with the aim of facilitating the rent of spacious flats for the youth.
I look forward to hearing from you to invite me to the interview session.
